workflowOptions.name: config
workflowOptions.help: Path to QC and Data Sampling configuration file.

workflowOptions.name: local
workflowOptions.help: Creates only the local part of the QC topology.

workflowOptions.name: host
workflowOptions.help: Name of the host of the local part of the QC topology.Necessary to specify when creating topologies on multiple machines. If not specified, hostname of the current machine will be used

workflowOptions.name: remote
workflowOptions.help: Creates only the remote part of the QC topology.

workflowOptions.name: no-data-sampling
workflowOptions.help: Do not add Data Sampling infrastructure.

workflowOptions.name: readers
workflowOptions.help: number of parallel readers to use

workflowOptions.name: pipeline
workflowOptions.help: override default pipeline size

workflowOptions.name: clone
workflowOptions.help: clone processors from a template

workflowOptions.name: workflow-suffix
workflowOptions.help: suffix to add to all dataprocessors

workflowOptions.name: aod-memory-rate-limit
workflowOptions.help: Rate limit AOD processing based on memory

workflowOptions.name: aod-writer-json
workflowOptions.help: Name of the json configuration file

workflowOptions.name: aod-writer-resfile
workflowOptions.help: Default name of the output file

workflowOptions.name: aod-writer-resmode
workflowOptions.help: Creation mode of the result files: NEW, CREATE, RECREATE, UPDATE

workflowOptions.name: aod-writer-ntfmerge
workflowOptions.help: Number of time frames to merge into one file

workflowOptions.name: aod-writer-keep
workflowOptions.help: Comma separated list of ORIGIN/DESCRIPTION/SUBSPECIFICATION:treename:col1/col2/..:filename

workflowOptions.name: fairmq-rate-logging
workflowOptions.help: Rate logging for FairMQ channels

workflowOptions.name: fairmq-recv-buffer-size
workflowOptions.help: recvBufferSize option for FairMQ channels

workflowOptions.name: fairmq-send-buffer-size
workflowOptions.help: sendBufferSize option for FairMQ channels

workflowOptions.name: fairmq-ipc-prefix
workflowOptions.help: Prefix for FairMQ channels location

workflowOptions.name: forwarding-policy
workflowOptions.help: Which messages to forward. dangling: dangling outputs, all: all messages

workflowOptions.name: forwarding-destination
workflowOptions.help: Destination for forwarded messages. file: write to file, fairmq: send to output proxy
